title: YARD / CUNO BODY
description: * Ask Cuno about the hanged man.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't tell the pig shit, Cuno!""
links.text: "Don't tell the pig shit, Cuno!"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This is where you *quickly* ask him..."
links.text: This is where you *quickly* ask him questions. Real cop-questions. Like a cop.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Pig's choking, he's totally chokin..."
links.text: "Pig's choking, he's totally choking!"

links.title: Drama: "Stop choking or everyone will see y..."
links.text: Stop choking or everyone will see you're a fake! All this *thespianism* isn't doing you any good!

links.title: Authority: "The kids are overwhelming you. Rega..."
links.text: The kids are overwhelming you. Regain control of yourself and the situation.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.)  "Kim, help me out here...."
links.text: (Whisper.)  "Kim, help me out here. What do we want to know?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If I were to want to waste my time..."
links.text: "If I were to want to waste my time -- which I do not -- I would ask them who he is, how he got there, and the *usual*."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The usual being "have you seen anyt..."
links.text: The usual being "have you seen anything out of the ordinary" or "have you seen anything suspicious"?

links.title: Suggestion: "You have no idea what the *usual* i..."
links.text: You have no idea what the *usual* is. Just ask whatever comes to mind.

links.title: You: ""I don't have questions.""
links.text: "I don't have questions."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fucking idiot *mulkkup채채* doesn't..."
links.text: "Fucking idiot *mulkkup채채* doesn't know any questions."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant is sitting on the ed..."
links.text: The lieutenant is sitting on the edge of his bed, twenty kilometres from here, and cleaning his boots. An archetypal policeman like him would *definitely* come up with some questions to ask right now. Unlike you, standing here alone, unable to gather your thoughts.

links.title: You: ""Where's the rest of his armour?""
links.text: "Where's the rest of his armour?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't give a shit about the..."
links.text: "Cuno doesn't give a shit about the armour."

links.title: You: ""How come?""
links.text: "How come?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's fuck-gimp's got one big thi..."
links.text: "Cuno's fuck-gimp's got one big thing wrong with him. He's a fucking mutant."

links.title: You: ""A mutant?""
links.text: "A mutant?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Do you remember how he looked?! Fu..."
links.text: "Do you remember how he looked?! Fucking growth hormone shit. He's a giant. The armour's too big for *any man*."

links.title: Cuno: "He drills his temples with his fing..."
links.text: He drills his temples with his fingers in some strange, aggressive gesture. "Cuno doesn't give a shit about that freak armour. Cuno threw that shit away."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Oh, come on. He's just pretending t..."
links.text: Oh, come on. He's just pretending that he doesn't care because he's too small for the armour.

links.title: You: ""You're just too small for the armo..."
links.text: "You're just too small for the armour."

links.title: Cuno: ""Get the fuck out of here, tryin'a..."
links.text: "Get the fuck out of here, tryin'a fuck on me with that midget shit? Cuno's twelve! He's huge!" He squints at you.

links.title: Cuno: ""What are you... fucking eighty? Wh..."
links.text: "What are you... fucking eighty? When Cuno's eighty, Cuno can fit four of you in Cuno! Fuck outta here!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Trying to fuck on Cuno? Fuck outta..."
links.text: "Trying to fuck on Cuno? Fuck outta here!"

links.title: You: ""What do you mean you *threw it awa..."
links.text: "What do you mean you *threw it away*?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno tried to get the helmet on. I..."
links.text: "Cuno tried to get the helmet on. It was too big." He performs a kick-off on the imaginary helmet.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno kicked that shit in the sea...."
links.text: "Cuno kicked that shit in the sea. Rugby style. That shit means *nothing* to Cuno."

links.title: You: ""You threw it in the sea?""
links.text: "You threw it in the sea?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, that shit means *nothing* to..."
links.text: "Yeah, that shit means *nothing* to Cuno," he repeats. "Cuno doesn't give a shit about material shit. Cuno's a fucking monk!"

links.title: Cuno: ""You wanna fuck on someone 'bout th..."
links.text: "You wanna fuck on someone 'bout that armour? Go fuck the moustached Union fuck -- the jolly troubadour shit at the gates."

links.title: You: ""Who do you mean, troubadour?""
links.text: "Who do you mean, troubadour?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cock-in-Boots. You know that..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cock-in-Boots. You know that jolly Union cow fucker? Came around talking about cows or some shit. Came around pretendin' like he cares about cows."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Yes, you met him at the gates. The..."
links.text: Yes, you met him at the gates. The one with the boots and the jolly smile.

links.title: You: ""You mean Ma챰ana?""
links.text: "You mean Ma챰ana?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, he's the one you wanna talk..."
links.text: "Yeah, he's the one you wanna talk to. He's fucking crazy about that armour shit. Coming here, pretending like he likes cows, tryin'a catch a peep at Cuno's armour."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He means Ma챰ana, the laid-back stri..."
links.text: He means Ma챰ana, the laid-back striker at the gates.

links.title: Cuno: ""So yeah, he's the one you wanna ta..."
links.text: "So yeah, he's the one you wanna talk to. He's fucking crazy about that armour shit. Coming here, pretending like he likes cows, tryin'a catch a peep at Cuno's armour... Go to the gates -- ask him yourself."

links.title: Drama: "Curious, my liege. Why did Cuno fee..."
links.text: Curious, my liege. Why did Cuno feed you this information?

links.title: You: ""And you're just telling me this ou..."
links.text: "And you're just telling me this out of the kindness of your heart, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno's doing charity today...."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno's doing charity today. Cuno Day. Cuno feels *sorry* for you two loser-pigs. Cuno's doing pity now."

links.title: Drama: "Still, seems suspicious... He may h..."
links.text: Still, seems suspicious... He may have it in for that guy. Or you may be paranoid. That is also a possibility, sire.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno's doing charity today...."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno's doing charity today. Cuno Day. Cuno feels *sorry* for you, loser-pig. Cuno's doing pity now."

links.title: You: "Let it be."
links.text: Let it be.

links.title: Drama: "Yes, pray pardon, sire! Better to l..."
links.text: Yes, pray pardon, sire! Better to let it be. I did not mean to make you paranoid.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. This troubadour has it. You ca..."
links.text: Yes. This troubadour has it. You can *feel* it.

links.title: Cuno: "He drills his temples with his fing..."
links.text: He drills his temples with his fingers in some strange, aggressive gesture. "Cuno doesn't give a shit about that freak armour. Cuno threw that shit away."

links.title: Cuno: ""Look at him!" He points to the bod..."
links.text: "Look at him!" He points to the body. "Fucking growth hormone shit. He's a giant. The armour's too big for *any man*."

links.title: You: ""Okay, another question then.""
links.text: "Okay, another question then."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shoot that shit at Cuno.""
links.text: "Shoot that shit at Cuno."

links.title: You: ""Do you know who he was?""
links.text: "Do you know who he was?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's fuck-gimp." He picks up a r..."
links.text: "Cuno's fuck-gimp." He picks up a rock. "Cuno uses the fuck-gimp for target practice."

links.title: Drama: "He's trying to hide the fact that h..."
links.text: He's trying to hide the fact that he doesn't know.

links.title: You: ""So you don't know anything.""
links.text: "So you don't know anything."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows all kinds of shit. Cuno..."
links.text: "Cuno knows all kinds of shit. Cuno's not a snitch, that's all." He shakes his head, clearly offended. "Tryin'a make the Cuno sing into the popophone..."

links.title: You: ""I meant who he *was*. Before he di..."
links.text: "I meant who he *was*. Before he died?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows what you meant. Cuno's..."
links.text: "Cuno knows what you meant. Cuno's not a snitch, that's all." He shakes his head, clearly offended. "Tryin'a make Cuno sing into the popophone..."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He could've just said he doesn't kn..."
links.text: He could've just said he doesn't know.

links.title: You: ""You could've just said you don't k..."
links.text: "You could've just said you don't know."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno *knows* shit. Cuno's not a sn..."
links.text: "Cuno *knows* shit. Cuno's not a snitch, that's all." He shakes his head, clearly offended. "Tryin'a make Cuno sing into the popophone..."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah it's fucking okay!" He throws..."
links.text: "Yeah it's fucking okay!" He throws the rock. It misses. "Gotta have a gimp for rock practice..."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't ask the pigs for permission,..."
links.text: "Don't ask the pigs for permission, Cuno. Don't ask the pigs for shit!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "End of conversation. Very strong. Y..."
links.text: End of conversation. Very strong. You should be this stoic.

links.title: You: ""Do you know how it got up there?""
links.text: "Do you know how it got up there?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Probably climbed? Cuno was busy *d..."
links.text: "Probably climbed? Cuno was busy *down the road* when that shit went down."

links.title: You: ""So you didn't see it happening?""
links.text: "So you didn't see it happening?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You heard Cuno -- Cuno wasn't even..."
links.text: "You heard Cuno -- Cuno wasn't even in Martinaise. Cuno wasn't in Revachol." He puffs himself up. "Cuno wasn't *regional*."

links.title: Drama: "The city's too large for him to hav..."
links.text: The city's too large for him to have left. But he wasn't *here* either... So where was he?

links.title: You: ""You didn't really leave the city...."
links.text: "You didn't really leave the city. Where were you?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Told you, pig bacon. Cuno doesn't..."
links.text: "Told you, pig bacon. Cuno doesn't do regional. Cuno's been to places you wouldn't dream of."

links.title: Cuno: ""Remember Night City, pig fuck? Cun..."
links.text: "Remember Night City, pig fuck? Cuno was in fucking Night City getting shit *done*."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""What the fuck, Cuno! Stop being so..."
links.text: "What the fuck, Cuno! Stop being so fucking lame!"

links.title: You: ""Okay. About the dead body...""
links.text: "Okay. About the dead body..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah? Cuno didn't smoke him, if th..."
links.text: "Yeah? Cuno didn't smoke him, if that's what you mean." He draws snot up his nose.

links.title: Logic: "Thanks, Cuno. That's one name you c..."
links.text: Thanks, Cuno. That's one name you can now cross off the list.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking Mesque, or I don't know. S..."
links.text: "Fucking Mesque, or I don't know. Some other place... Night City! Cuno was in fucking Night City."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "There is no Night City anywhere. Th..."
links.text: There is no Night City anywhere. That sounds like the name of a city in some pulp science fiction novel.

links.title: You: ""That's a fictional city name. Nigh..."
links.text: "That's a fictional city name. Night City doesn't exist."

links.title: Cuno: ""Why you gotta be riding Cuno's ass..."
links.text: "Why you gotta be riding Cuno's ass? You haven't been where Cuno's been. You haven't been in Cuno's head."

links.title: Cuno: ""You wanna know where Cuno was? You..."
links.text: "You wanna know where Cuno was? You wanna know what Cuno's been fucking *up* to?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't tell him that Cuno, it's lam..."
links.text: "Don't tell him that Cuno, it's lame!"

links.title: Cuno: ""It's not fucking lame! Cuno's buil..."
links.text: "It's not fucking lame! Cuno's building Cuno's city -- Night City, Rage City, the City of Rage. That's it. And it's not lame!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Lame!""
links.text: "Lame!"

links.title: Cuno: ""That's the name of Cuno's city, bi..."
links.text: "That's the name of Cuno's city, bitch! Get the fuck off Cuno's back. This shit ain't about that."

links.title: Interfacing: "What the hell *is* it about then? A..."
links.text: What the hell *is* it about then? A city of toys? No, with this kid, it's probably made of cigarette butts. Or maybe sand and melting snow?

links.title: Logic: "This is a minor discovery. Don't le..."
links.text: This is a minor discovery. Don't let this Night City business clog up your mind. Proceed with your investigation. If it's really important, it will come up later.

links.title: Logic: "It's impossible to deduce what it *..."
links.text: It's impossible to deduce what it *is* about, at least for the moment. If it's important, it'll come up later. Focus on the case.

links.title: You: ""Where is Night City?""
links.text: "Where is Night City?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno gives this info out on a need..."
links.text: "Cuno gives this info out on a need-to-know basis. And *you* don't need to know." He draws snot up his nose. "Cuno didn't smoke the gimp, if that's what you meant."

links.title: You: ""Oh, okay. Where did you go then?""
links.text: "Oh, okay. Where did you go then?"

links.title: Cuno: ""I don't know, some fucking..." He..."
links.text: "I don't know, some fucking..." He looks around, trying to come up with something.

links.title: Cuno: ""Mesque, or... or I don't know. Som..."
links.text: "Mesque, or... or I don't know. Some other place... Night City! Cuno was in fucking Night City."

links.title: You: ""Have you seen anyone suspicious ar..."
links.text: "Have you seen anyone suspicious around?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Just a couple of pigs sniffing aro..."
links.text: "Just a couple of pigs sniffing around in the dirt. That seems pretty fucking suspicious to Cuno."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, you tell the *f채g채ri*, Cuno!""
links.text: "Yeah, you tell the *f채g채ri*, Cuno!"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Looks like you're a *f채g채ri* now, w..."
links.text: Looks like you're a *f채g채ri* now, whatever that means. The *suspicious* question doesn't really work in antagonistic situations.

links.title: Cuno: ""Just a lone pig trying to sugar-ta..."
links.text: "Just a lone pig trying to sugar-talk some kids. That seems pretty fucking suspicious to Cuno."

links.title: You: ""There are contusions all over his..."
links.text: "There are contusions all over his body. Did you do that?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck are you talking about? What i..."
links.text: "Fuck are you talking about? What is this *con-tush-on* shit?" He grabs his head like it's suddenly hurting.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He says you're *stupid*, Cuno! The..."
links.text: "He says you're *stupid*, Cuno! They want to make you stupid again!"

links.title: You: ""A contusion is a bruise. I'm talki..."
links.text: "A contusion is a bruise. I'm talking about the marks your stones left on the corpse."

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh, did Cuno make your shit-sniffi..."
links.text: "Oh, did Cuno make your shit-sniffing harder? Obstruction of shit-sniffing?" He lets go of his head, suddenly feeling better. "This is Cuno's Kingdom. Cuno fucking rules here."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Hmmm..." you hear the lieutenant h..."
links.text: "Hmmm..." you hear the lieutenant hum.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He's thinking the kid has amassed q..."
links.text: He's thinking the kid has amassed quite the vocabulary of law-enforcement terms. But he's not going to stick his nose into this.

links.title: You: ""Me and my partner are wondering, w..."
links.text: "Me and my partner are wondering, where did you pick up so many police terms?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Me and *my* partner are wondering...."
links.text: "Me and *my* partner are wondering..." The demonic hiss behind the fence gets louder. "Do you guys puff Peter?"

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno erupts into laughter, pointing..."
links.text: Cuno erupts into laughter, pointing his finger at you, then Kim, then back at you...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "An unfortunate choice of words, the..."
links.text: An unfortunate choice of words, the lieutenant from Precinct 57 thinks. He looks downwind at the rotting corpse. He could use a cigarette right about now.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "An unfortunate choice of words, the..."
links.text: An unfortunate choice of words, the lieutenant from Precinct 57 thinks. He looks at the harbour walls looming overhead. He could use a cigarette right about now.

links.title: You: "Proceed with the questioning."
links.text: Proceed with the questioning.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Good. That's what the lieutenant fr..."
links.text: Good. That's what the lieutenant from Precinct 57 would have done as well.

links.title: You: ""Yes, that's what I'm saying. You'r..."
links.text: "Yes, that's what I'm saying. You're stupid."

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno lets go of his head. "Get the..."
links.text: Cuno lets go of his head. "Get the fuck out of here, calling Cuno stupid? Pigs come to Cuno for guidance, then say he's stupid? The fuck is up with that?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""They're lost without you, Cuno! Th..."
links.text: "They're lost without you, Cuno! They need you. You're in control of this!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Why don't you figure your shit out..."
links.text: "Why don't you figure your shit out yourself -- before you come to *Detective Cuno* for help?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmmm... maybe we should." The lieu..."
links.text: "Hmmm... maybe we should." The lieutenant raises an eyebrow.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Got told by a twelve-year old. Here..."
links.text: Got told by a twelve-year old. Here's a tip for the future: If you wanna win an argument, wait for my sign. Don't just go barging in.

links.title: You: ""I hate words too.""
links.text: "I hate words too."

links.title: Cuno: ""Words are fucking shit, make you s..."
links.text: "Words are fucking shit, make you stupid!" He spits on the ground. "Cuno's got his own words now -- Cuno-words."

links.title: Logic: "Has Cuno been to some kind of schoo..."
links.text: Has Cuno been to some kind of school? Probably a school for children with behavioural difficulties.

links.title: You: ""Cuno, shouldn't you be at school o..."
links.text: "Cuno, shouldn't you be at school or something?"

links.title: Cuno: ""That's the past, pig. Cuno's not *..."
links.text: "That's the past, pig. Cuno's not *there* anymore. Cuno did his time." He nods solemnly. "Now ask about that pig corpse shit and don't go sniffing into Cuno's past!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Pigs come to take you back, Cuno!"..."
links.text: "Pigs come to take you back, Cuno!" the hat-wearing fiend shrieks. "Tryin'a dig up dirt on you!"

links.title: You: ""I have behavioural difficulties to..."
links.text: "I have behavioural difficulties too."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Watch out, Cuno, he's trying to re..."
links.text: "Watch out, Cuno, he's trying to relate to you!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't give a shit about you..."
links.text: "Cuno doesn't give a shit about your handicap. Get a wheelchair or something. Cuno doesn't care."

links.title: Suggestion: "It's tough to tell, but he actually..."
links.text: It's tough to tell, but he actually does... a little. He tilts his head to the right, reassessing you in the light of your bad ass learning disability.

links.title: You: "Better not to mention it."
links.text: Better not to mention it.

links.title: Logic: "How is that better? At least get ba..."
links.text: How is that better? At least get back to the corpse then.

links.title: You: ""Let's back up. This isn't going an..."
links.text: "Let's back up. This isn't going anywhere."

links.title: Cuno: "The buck-toothed gremlin lets go of..."
links.text: The buck-toothed gremlin lets go of his head. Looks like the attack has passed.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The pain of the word recedes, he's..."
links.text: The pain of the word recedes, he's feeling better now. Further away from *education*.

links.title: You: ""More on this later. Right now let'..."
links.text: "More on this later. Right now let's talk about something else."

links.title: Cuno: ""You're testing Cuno's patience her..."
links.text: "You're testing Cuno's patience here."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Get lost, f****t!""
links.text: "Get lost, f****t!"
